clusters.title: TikTok Growth
clusters.description: TikTok is a rapidly growing social media platform with over 1 billion active users globally. In the United States, it has been downloaded over 220 million times. Indonesia records the highest usage with more than 100 million users, while China has 755 million active users. As of 2023, TikTok has 1.04 billion monthly active users, and it is projected to reach 2.35 billion users by 2029.
